    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball(double startX,
            double startY,
            BallMovement direction,
            int sizeIn)
        Creates a ball with a set horizontal speed and a variable vertical speed depending on size.
        Parameters:
        startX - - X-coordinate to make the ball
        startY - - Y-coordinate to make the ball
        direction - - Direction the ball should move, valid inputs are: "left" and "right", anything else randomizes the direction.
        sizeIn - - The desired size of the ball, Greater then 4 or smaller then 0 results in a size 4 ball.

    • Method Detail

      • doUpdate

        public void doUpdate()
        Method that updates the ball.
        Overrides:
        doUpdate in class GameObject

      • move

        public void move()
        Calculates and sets the next position the ball should be drawn in.

      • collisionHook

        public boolean collisionHook()
        Method that checks whether the ball collides with the Hook.
        Returns:
        returns true if the hook is hit, returns false otherwise.

      • destroyball

        public void destroyball()
        Adds score (WIP), spawns two balls going left and right respectively on itself, and removes this ball.
